name: Custom Shirt
description:
Create a custom shirt and have your message heard! You have a max of 10 words and can use any font available in MS Word in a 7" x 8" section on the front of a shirt. Directions to complete your order below.

1. Choose your size. (T-shirt will be black, high quality 50/50 poly/cotton.)
2. Add to cart.
3. Pay now.
4. You will be dirrected to the Paypal process payment page.
5. Click "Review and Continue."
6. Click "Add Note to seller" under your shipping address.
7. Add your text you want on the shirt along with the name of the font. 
8. Click "Save"
9. Once you hit pay On The Hill Clothing will receive your payment and start your order.

Please note: This is for text only, no graphics. If you are interested in having graphic based shirts or more than 1 made, please contact us through the contact page. Thanks!
